text: Shared as a spoken essay w/ the Penn Listening Lab, Abike James, MD, MPH, (@JamesAbike) recalled receiving her first shot of the #COVID19 #vaccine, hoping that her mother would choose to be vaccinated next, even amidst hesitancy within her family. https://t.co/6fWWXuOwVU https://t.co/ySdmlg5yli
